title: ANWE bilengwa byonsetu
author: Unknown
verses: Anwe juba mwasamisha, Ne anwe gondo mwakema,
Anwe ntanda musekele, Anwe minyanya mutote,
Ne anweba ba bulanda, Mumutwike'bo Yehoba.
Mutote Tata ne Mwana, Ne Mupashi, Lesa umo,

title: ATOTWE Nambo wabulume
author: Unknown
verses: Kine mumona bibusa byanji moba onse.
Byonse bipema, nenuwa, mumu totesh' Aye.

title: BYO bwakya ke lukelo
author: Unknown
verses: Wa kungita kulomba, Yesu atotwe pe.

title: JUMVWANYIKE Konsetu
author: Unknown
verses: Anwe ba njimi yonse, Mumutote yenkaye.
Bomvwe ne be a chaina, ne bansamya bonsetu.
Ne monse mu Africa batumbijike Yesu.
Ne ku makuji onse a kukalunga;
Bembe bena mavunda ne baji ku mashika.
Ba mutote bonsetu myaka yonse kikupu.

title: LESA Walengele Ntanda
author: Unknown
verses: Mu kipasha kyaniji kya myaka yonse.
chorus: Tutote Lesa Mwine wa myaka yonse.

title: LESA Wami
author: Unknown
verses: LESA wami, byo mmona byo mwalenga,
Byo ngenda mungye ne kumona bichi,

title: MAJIMI Twiajima
author: Unknown
verses: Ne nkunwa ke imene mu lusa lwa Lesa.
Byonse byo tumona bifuma kwi Lesa,
Nanchi tutote mambo a lolwa lusa lwanji.
Ne bipangwa ne bishutu ne Byonse byo tuja,
Ye yenka wibajisha ba pano pa ntanda,
Ne mana, ne bulume, ne mema, ne byo tuja;

title: Mutotai! Yesu Mukuzhi Wetu
author: Unknown
verses: Kilishitu wiya, aye ye wa bulobo,

title: Mwana Mukoko'wa!
author: Unknown
verses: Umvwai Lwimbo wa mwiulu wakila yonsetu.
Mupopwelai ke mfumu wa myaka yonsetu.
Mfumu wa mweo pe washinda kilende,
Wasanguka ne mu lufu mu kupulusha bantu.
Lufu lwanji lo lwitupa mweo wa pe na pe.
Mfumu wa mutende ye mfumu wa konse,
Upwisha nkondo pano panshi amba bamutote;
Ne bufumu wanji kechi bukapwa ne,
Ba mwiulu bamutota ku maulu anji.
Bito bya mu makasa anji byavwikwa lukumo,
Ne ba malaika bevweta pa menso,
Pa kukumya lumanamo lwa mwana wa Lesa.
Mfumu wa mwiulu Lesa yenka umo,
Ne mupashi watumwa panshi kufuma mwiulu,
Lutotelo ne lukumo lo lwenu kikupu.

title: Tota Mfumu Wa Mwiulu
author: Unknown
verses: Utoteshe, utoteshe, mfumu wa myaka yonse.
Ne lelo uji pamotu, Kasanga atemwa lusa,
Tumutote, tumutote, wa kishinka pa bonse.
Mu maboko anji Mwine mo twikela mutende,
Twanekena no buluba, bulakata na mwela,
Bantu bo baalauka, Lesa ke waluka ne,
Tumutote, Tumutote, mwine wa mwiulu pe.
Anwe bilengwa bonsetu, bya Mwiulu ne panshi,
Tumutote, bonse nenu, Lesa wetu wa lusa.

title: Totai Jizhina Ja Yehoba
author: Unknown
verses: Totai jizhina ja Yehoba Lesa wetu,
Mwambishenga konse konse bya kumutotesha ku bonse,
Poso bonse bomvwishe bya lusa lwanji.
Ye wasangukile kine, wabwelele Kwiulu kwanji,
Ye ukeya jibiji pa kulonda banji,
Mu jonkaja juba ja bulume ne lukumo,
Ntanda ikalumbuluka ke ya wamisha ne ya buya;
Mambo mfumu ukeya na bazhila banji,
Mu kubwezha Byonse monka mo byajinga.
Bya mwiulu ne bya panshi bikasangalala,
Ne majimwa a Yesu jitotwa milomo;
Tumutote, Tumutote konse kwa bakwe Lesa.
Tumutote, Tumutote mwine wa myaka yonse.

title: Toteshai Yehoba Lelo Ja Nseko
author: Unknown
verses: Sapwila na nseko konse ko muya

title: Tumuvwike Ye Mfumu Wetu
author: Unknown
verses: Ne bonse ba pano pa ntanda bamwimbile pamo.

title: Tusekele Bonse, Yesu By'aji Mfumu
author: Unknown
verses: Mukuzhi ye mfumu, mfumu wa butemwe
Waikele ku kilujo kya kwa Lesa
Bufumu bo bwanji, ne lusa lonsetu
Lwa pa Byonse bya mwiulu ne bya panshi
Wapewa kii wa lufu ne wa kalunga
Yesu ye ukeya na kuchiba mambo

title: Twapika Sante Kwi Lesa Wetu
author: Unknown
verses: Mambo etu wazhima mu michima yetu.
Na mujilo wa lesa wafuma mwiulu.

title: Wazhila, Wazhila, Wa Bulume Bonse
author: Unknown
verses: Wazhila, wazhila, wa lusa ne lusa
Lesa wa myaka ne wa bibusa
Mwazhila anweba, ka kuji mu kwabo
Nabyo bya mwiulu ne bya pano panshi
Lesa wa myaka ne wa bibusa.

title: Ye Mfumu Wetu, Tumupopwele
author: Unknown
verses: Wa myaka ne miaka ne wa lukumo
Wa mana onsetu ne wa bulobo
Mu moba onsetu a myeo yetu
Byanji bya lusa bya myaka yonse
Bimweka ku juba ne mu mikola
Mu majimi monse ne mu matala
Pene pene pamo, po paji lusa
Pa lusa pa lusa, po pa kalvali

title: Yehova Wa Myaka, Wa Mana Onse Mwifya Mu Kyeya Kibulwa Kuatlwa
author: Unknown
verses: Yehova wa myaka, wa mana onse mwifya mu kyeya kibulwa kutalwa
Anweba mwi bumi wa bantu bonse
Yehova wa miaka, wa mana onse

title: Yesu Ukekala Mfumu Mwine
author: Unknown
verses: Ba mu mikoka yonse ya pano

title: Anwe Bantu Bonse Ba Pano Panshi
author: Unknown
verses: Anwe bantu bonse ba pano panshi
Ne ngolode ya mfumu wetu Yesu

title: BAKAFUNGA byo balamanga mikoko yabo
author: Unknown
verses: Mu betelema ja lelo mukuzhi wasemwa
Yenka wa kwibapulusha bantu Banji bonse
Bamwekele ne kutota Lesa wa mwiulu
Bonse baimbilenga amba lukumo kwi Lesa
Mutende ku bantu bonse ba pano pa ntanda

title: BAKAFUNGA mikoko bo batanshi kumvwa
author: Unknown
verses: Jiwi ja ba malaika monka mungye
Sa balama jitanga ja mikoko yabo
Sa kasama pa ntanda, ponsetu patoka
Ne ba mana basatu bafumine kwabo
Sa bendela mu kyokya kyeya kyatoka
Sa bata ne muchima kumona mfumu
Ne kufika ku muzhi wa betelema
Ko kalekele kwenda ne kwimana ponka
Ne ba mana basatu batwelele monka
Ne kulambula Konka byonse bya bufumu
Ne atweba bonsetu na muchima umo
Ye yenka wa lengele ntanda ne jiulu
Ne kukula atweba na mashi anji

title: BAKWETU twimbishaipo
author: Unknown
verses: Na lusa lobe lelo, Yobe mfumu wa
Butemwe bwa Tata buno, ne lusa
Twaji twafwa nao pa mambo a

title: BUFUKU bwazhindama
author: Unknown
verses: Byo asemenwe pano panshi mupulushi wa lusa

title: BYO mwaishile mu kungedel’amiwa
author: Unknown
verses: Mwaishile Nkambo na mambo a bubi
Nkomvwe jiwi jenu ja kungita amiwa
Ku mulunda wasemwa mwibape ya musela

title: IYAI bantu bonse ba pano pa ntanda
author: Unknown
verses: IYAI bantu bonse ba pano pa ntanda,
Talai bantu bonse kuji Mwana Lesa,
Wafumine mwiulu, ne bumi bwa myaka
Imbai bantu bonse, imbai kwi Lesa,
Kwi Yesu kilishitu mwine, mupulushi wetu

title: KALA mu lukena mwa davida
author: Unknown
verses: Ye Lesa, ye Nkambo ya bonse;
Ye mfumu wa myaka ne wa myaka

title: KWASEMWA mwana lelo
author: Unknown
verses: Sekelai bakafunga, ki ka kyo muchina?
Lwaiya ku bantu bonse pa kusemwa mwana.
Ba lusa Bo atuma mwine wa mwiulu.
Batota Lesa wetu ye mfumu wa mwiulu
Bataine mwana Yesu, ne inanji maliya.

title: MWIYE anweba Emanuele
author: Unknown
verses: Ku mfungwa ya buzha bwa panshi

title: OBEWA kamuzhi betelema
author: Unknown
verses: Ke Pakuba mu mashinda obe onsetu
Kechi bamumvwa sa apana bibusa ne,

title: UMVWISHAI anweba, Yesu witusemenwa
author: Unknown
verses: Aye ye mwana Lesa ye batengela myaka.
Walala mwa banyama, yenka walenga Ntanda,
Yenka waji na Lesa ne na bamalaika.
Ki ka kyo mwalekela mikoko pa Mitumba?
Ba mwiulu sa bemba, Mupulushi wasemwa.
chorus: Juba ja lusekelo, jo ja lupulukilo,

title: YESU Wasemenwe kwi shanji
author: Unknown
verses: Ne bijipo ne Byajingapo ku nyuma

title: Juba ja
author: Unknown
verses: Ba pano panshi sa boba bibi,

title: Mwaumvwa mambo a yewa
author: Unknown
verses: Nasekela kwimubula ne lelo ye ujiko.
Mwaumvwa ne byo anyanta pa mema
Kuya kuji bana banji pa mema a Ngalilea,
Nasekela kwimubula ne lelo ye ujiko.
Ne byo afwile lufu lubi konka ku
Wibikwa miba ku mutwe ne bivwalo
Amu monse witukula ne lelo ye ujiko.
Aye yenka ye tupopa ye Nkambo
Atotwe ne kutotwa! IIunga wa bisela

title: Byo ntala ko amfwijile Yesu
author: Unknown
verses: Poso mu lufu lwa Yesu kilishitu.
Ne ku makasa ne ku maulu!

title: Juba ja
author: Unknown
verses: Ba pano panshi sa boba bibi,

title: Mwaumvwa mambo a yewa
author: Unknown
verses: Nasekela kwimubula ne lelo ye ujiko.
Mwaumvwa ne byo anyanta pa mema
Kuya kuji bana banji pa mema a Ngalilea,
Nasekela kwimubula ne lelo ye ujiko.
Ne byo afwile lufu lubi konka ku
Wibikwa miba ku mutwe ne bivwalo
Amu monse witukula ne lelo ye ujiko.
Aye yenka ye tupopa ye Nkambo
Atotwe ne kutotwa! IIunga wa bisela

title: Byo ntala ko amfwijile Yesu
author: Unknown
verses: Poso mu lufu lwa Yesu kilishitu.
Ne ku makasa ne ku maulu!

title: KU kalvali yesu kilishitu
subtitle: Mwana lesa wamfwijile
verses: Ye kalama wa pe na pe.

title: MASHI a mukuzhi ko aji
subtitle: A kupwisha mambo a bantu
verses: Kapondo wafwile ne yesu wasekelele pa kowamo,

title: MASHI anema ko aji a kwa emanuele
subtitle: A kufyamamo ba mambo atoka to byo aji
verses: MASHI anema ko aji a kwa emanuele,
A kufyamamo ba mambo atoka to byo aji.

title: NTANGI wa lufu lwa kwa Yesu
verses: NTANGI wa lufu lwa kwa Yesu

title: PAKUTAJISHA musalabu
verses: Kana ku lufu lwa kwa Yesu;
Biji pamo na bya kwa Yesu.

title: KILISHITU wasanguka lelo
verses: Ne ba pano panshi betabe’mba, Aleluya!
Ku kilujo kya kwa Lesa, Aleluya!

title: WALELE mu kyumbwe-Yesu
chorus: Pano ke wa bumi bwa myaka yonse

title: umvwai byo bemba bamaleka
verses: mfumu wa lukumo, mfumu wa lusa

title: wavwajile kala miba
verses: ke wa bumi ne wa mweo

title: byo akeya, byo akeya
verses: yenka uji mwiulu, ke ya myaka ne myaka

title: mbunge byo ikatatama
verses: mbunge byo ikatatama, ne byonse bikapita,
ba kwa kilishitu bakapwila mu muzhi wa kwa lesa,
aja juba japelako pa kusanguka bafu
ne kuvwala lukumo iwa kwa yesu, baitwa byo bakapwila mwabo monka mwiulu,
twisambe pa mambo a lusa lwanji,
byonkabyo pa kupwisha mingilo yonsetu pano.

title: tuji pa mutumba walepa
verses: nanchi twatana mfishi ya bubi, itwabanya na lesa.

title: usakukeya yenka yesu mukuzhi
verses: mambo bonse mwaluba juba jo nkeya
mambo a yesu yenka aye ukeya,

title: mupashi ntangi wetu mwikale ne atweba
verses: mupashi ntangi wetu mwikale ne atweba ,
mwitukwate kuboko byo tuji pano panshi.
bakoka basekela pa kumvwa jiwi jenu
anweba muji kwipi,mwi nkwasho wa bonsetu
inge mwituleke ne, twakamona bya malwa,
by'apwa mingilo yetu,tukatambulwa kwenu; tukasekela kine pa kufikako bonse,
tukomvwa jiwi janji amba, iyai bonse.

title: nkambo yesu byo ayile
verses: jiwi janji jitwambila no mwela wapela

title: anwe bantu bonse, iyai
verses: mwi yesu, mwi yesu, mwi yesu,
anwe bantu bonse, mukiji mu mfishi,

title: anwe bantu bonse mutale kwi yesu
verses: anwe bantu bonse mutale kwi yesu

title: bubi, bubi, bubi
verses: fwensya, ku bwipi na lesa wetu,

title: iyaipo
verses: pano iyai kwawama, iyai kwi yesu.
aye waswa, aye waswa, aye waswa bonse
pano aye yesu waswa, aye waswa bonse.
yesu ukemutokesha na mashi a kwinji
pano ukemuyokesha na mashi a kwinji.

title: kana waya kala kuji mukuzhi
verses: na bubi bwa pano pa ntanda;
owa monka mu mashi a mupulushi

title: kwajinga muntu umo
verses: watayile mweo wanji yense mu bya
lelo jonka mweo obe ubena kukebewa.
kechi utaye mweo wob'e yense mu

title: lesa watumine nowa, amba
subtitle: ukasongele bwato
author: unknown
verses: ye uji na bumi bwa pe.
addedChorus: bamwene mubiji, bamwene, bamwena mubiji wa yesu.

title: muchima ubenekunkatazha
author: unknown
verses: pa kwiya yesu kana nkoba byepi

title: pa jinga pa kijilo kya mfumu
author: unknown
verses: pa jinga pa kijilo kya mfumu
paka chi ka bufuku mu kipango

title: sa mwijumva jiwi ja bibusa
author: unknown
verses: sa mweya moba onse kwi yesu
